Our Culture

Zypers culture is nimble ,aware and entirely committed to using generative AI technology to help our thousands of customers across the world grow better

Our Mission: Make Growth Marketing Painless, Seamless and Easily Accessible

We want to remove all friction at the vertices of creative design, copy content, marketing tools and ad platforms and have a unified generative ai driven platform that does not require any technology or marketing expertise to use, for our thousands of customers across the globe

Our Story

Swati Gupta, our founder and Carnegie Mellon alum with a Computer Science undergraduate degree, spent over 10 years building her previous eCommerce startup, industrybuying.com. She experienced firsthand the friction when trying to create a unified, smoothly running marketing machine for digital growth, despite the availability of hundreds of marketing tools. The friction existed due to creative design, copy editing, marketing tools, and ad platforms being siloed. With generative AI technology able to generate copy, creatives, and machine learning models able to optimize performance, she was able to transform marketing into a smooth, efficient, integrated, and lean machine.

The conviction that SMBs across the world need the same generative AI-first, seamless marketing experienceunfettered by hunting for creative designers, integrating tools, searching for performance marketers, and stitching together these silosled her to found Zyper.ai [ISTPL Pvt. Ltd.]
